Creates a random uniform 0-1 for a given random seed substream and updates the value

runif_stream.Rd

Creates a random uniform 0-1 for a given random seed substream and updates the value

Usage

runif_stream(n = 1, random_seed, gen = "event_seq")

Arguments

n

Number of elements

random_seed

Substream to be used

gen

Context in which the function is applied. Can be values "event" (reaction to an event), "add_item" (when used within add_item for unique_pt_inputs argument in run_sim), "initialize" (if used within the "add_tte" function), "event" if used in modify_item, and "event_seq" (assumed that by default, so no need to be declared explicitly) for modify_item_seq

Value

A vector of uniform values between 0 and 1

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
x <- .Random.seed
runif_stream(n=1, x, gen="event")
} # }
